PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2004-11542004-10-08,  ,  ,  PMO, 
ActPublic Service Rearrangement and Transfer of Duties Act
PrecisTransfer to the Department of Citizenship and Immigration of (a) the portions of the Canada Border Services Agency that carry out pre-removal risk assessments and, (b) the powers, duties and functions provided for in subsection 77(1) of the Immigration and Refugee Protection Act that were transferred pursuant to Order in Council P.C. 2003-2063 of December 12, 2003.
RegistrationRegistration: SI/ 2004-0135 Publication Date: 2004-10-20
